Th ird stage Th is is the period from aft er delivery of the baby to delivery of the placenta. Th is stage takes about 15 
minutes to half an hour, irrespective of whether the woman is a primagravida or multigravida.
Fourth stage Th is is the fi rst two hours aft  er the delivery of the placenta. Th is is a critical period as PPH, a potentially 
fatal complication, is likely to occur during this stage.
